person.persName: Benjamin F. Edwards (Nicholas Co, KY, farmer)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Berry Edwards in Nicholas County on November 3, 1836. Father of Laura J. Edwards, Sarah “Sallie” R. Edwards, Lucy E. Edwards, Martha A. Edwards, Charles Wickliffe Edwards, and Harlan Berry Edwards. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1860. Household owned an additional two persons in Nicholas County in 1860.
